bioAsHtml: Julien Richard-Foy likes writing programs. He is particularly attentive to the way programming languages influence how we can express programs, and how they provide solutions to engineering challenges. He is fascinated by languages that make it easy to turn ideas into programs that are executable by machines and easy to reason about by humans. He writes tools and MOOCs for the good of the community, at Scala Center.
